summary: LUG STUDS IDENTIFIED AS ZB 4327 MANUFACTURED BY UNIQUE FUNCTIONAL PRODUCTS OF SAN MARCOS, CA, FAILED PRIOR TO USE IN A STATIC REST AND AFTER 50 MILES ON THE ROAD.  IN ALL THREE CASES, THE LUG STUDS COMPLETELY BROKE FROM A TENSILE FORCE AND IN ONE CASE, PLATING WAS FOUND ON THE SURFACE OF THE CRACK, INDICATING THE CRACK EXISTED AT THE TIME IT WAS MANUFACTURED.  *TR
